means: 在波涛中翻滚( billow的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The national flag is billowing in the breeze.
On the vast fields, one sees nothing but the wheat billowing in the wind.
sentence.Network_cn: 在辽阔的原野上, 但见麦浪随风起伏.

sentence.Network_en: A field of burning grass is billowing thick black clouds of smoke into the sky.
sentence.Network_cn: 一片燃烧着的草冒出的滚滚黑烟直冲云霄.

brandish中文 ... brandish 挥舞 billowing 如波浪般翻滚的 brandish 威胁性的挥舞.
billowcloud 波状云, billowing 波浪形, billowiness 浪涛汹涌

billow ... wind that billowed the sails. 风鼓起船帆 angry billows 怒涛 billows of flames 烈焰翻滚.

entry.def: When something made of cloth billows, it swells out and moves slowly in the wind.

example.ex: The curtains billowed in the breeze...
example.tran: 窗帘在微风中鼓了起来。

example.ex: Her pink dress billowed out around her.
example.tran: 她粉红色的连衣裙鼓了起来。

entry.def: When smoke or cloud billows, it moves slowly upwards or across the sky.

example.ex: ...thick plumes of smoke billowing from factory chimneys...
example.tran: 工厂烟囱冒出的滚滚浓烟

example.ex: Steam billowed out from under the bonnet.
example.tran: 引擎盖下喷出滚滚的蒸汽。

entry.def: A billow of smoke or dust is a large mass of it rising slowly into the air.

example.ex: ...smoke stacks belching billows of almost solid black smoke.

means.word_mean: 1. moving in surges and billows and rolls;
2. characterized by great swelling waves or surges;
